text: is a former Japanese football player who played as an attacking midfielder.Shohei Matsunaga on Soccerway He was called Samurai Matsunaga by his fans because of his samurai-like playing spirit. ==References== ==External links== * * *Shohei Matsunaga at Liga Indonesia.co.id Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Kokushikan University alumni Category:Association football people from Shizuoka Prefecture Category:Japanese footballers Category:J2 League players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:FC Schalke 04 II players Category:Ehime FC players Category:Persib Bandung players Category:Persiba Balikpapan players Category:Gresik United players Category:Japanese expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Japanese expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Indonesia Category:Association football midfielders
title: Shohei Matsunaga
